column4: Is it possible to link 2 computers with the ethernet cable ????

yes, and to answer the question you had before. it depends wether you configured your IPs and subnets correctly i suggest you use 192.168.0.1 and 192.168.0.2 and for the subnet 255.255.255.0 or /24 depending on the format you have to input into your network config tool.
